p: The EO of Z. armatum DC. was collected as a milky-white, oil-like liquid with a strong aroma, and the extraction rate was 4.07%. The results of GC-MS and database analysis are shown in Table 1. There were 66 components in the EO, accounting for 97.88% of the total EO. The main components of the EO were Î²-caryophyllene (7.53%), D-limonene (13.24%), linalool (41.73%), 4-terpenol (5.33%), and trans-nerolidol (6.30%). These major components could be the basis of alternative antifungal materials.
